subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The former University of Connecticut standout Shea Ralph will return to Storrs as an assistant coach of the women’s team. Ralph was captain of the Huskies when they won the 2000 national championship. She finished her college career eighth on UConn’s career scoring list and in the top 10 in assists, steals and field goal percentage. The W.N.B.A.’s Utah Starzz chose Ralph in the 2001 draft, but a knee injury cut short her professional career. She served the past five seasons as assistant coach at Pittsburgh.
